name: Italian Style Sausage
author: Lee Fogle
summary: I like to add Italian sausage as a topping on my homemade pizza. Came up with this blend after much experimentation. I fry it all and freeze in portions for use as pizza topping. It's ground pork with all fixings to make a simple sausage you can prepare at home.
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
directions: In a small bowl, combine the ground black pepper, parsley, Italian-style seasoning, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, anise, paprika, minced onion flakes and salt; mix well
Place pork in a separate large bowl and add the spice mix to it
Mix this thoroughly with your hands
In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the seasoned pork for 10 minutes, or until well browned and crumbly
